product_name: Big Agnes Fly Creek UL3 Tent
long_description: An ultralight, three-season tent for three that weighs in at 3 lbs., the Big Agnes Fly Creek UL3 grants protection from bugs and rain at a weight that even one person can easily carry alone.
short_description: An ultralight, three-season tent for three that weighs in at 3 lbs., the Big Agnes Fly Creek UL3 grants protection from bugs and rain at a weight that even one person can easily carry alone.
